title: Chiefs Doubts, Brady in L.A., Million-Dollar Picks, and Sox-Yanks With Peter Schrager and Billâ€™s Dad
description:
The Ringer's Bill Simmons is joined by NFL Network's Peter Schrager to discuss some of the upcoming NFL games for the weekend and make their Million-Dollar Picks for Week 3 (3:22). Then Bill talks with his dad about Boston sports, the Ryder Cup, and more (1:08:30).

Host: Bill Simmons
Guests: Peter Schrager and Bill's Dad
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
